definitions.text: wet feed (especially for pigs) consisting of mostly kitchen waste mixed with water or skimmed or sour milk
deep soft mud in water or slush
(usually plural) waste water from a kitchen or bathroom or chamber pot that has to be emptied by hand
examples: she carried out the sink slops

definitions.text: (usually plural) weak or watery unappetizing food or drink
examples: he lived on the thin slops that food kitchens provided

definitions.text: writing or music that is excessively sweet and sentimental
cause or allow (a liquid substance) to run or flow from a container

examples: We had to splosh across the wet meadow
slop the food onto the plate
